briefTitle: A Study of S6G5T-3 in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multi-Center, Double-Blind, Randomized, Vehicle-Controlled Study of S6G5T-3 in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris

interventions.name: S6G5T-3
otherNames: Encapsulated Benzoyl Peroxide (E-BPO) and Encapsulated Tretinoin (E-ATRA) Cream, (E-BPO/E-ATRA Cream)

summary: To assess the efficacy of S6G5T-3 compared to its Vehicle when applied once daily for 12 weeks in participants with acne vulgaris.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving an IGA Score of Clear or Almost Clear and a Score â‰¥2 Grades Less Than Baseline
